name: Deer Hunting 2016
description: This is a brand new most realistic and authentic jungle animal hunting game especially for those who cannot hunt a single wild animal in real life. Hunt down the jungle animals in this best first person sniper shooting and hunting game. If you become a professional wild animal hunter this game provides a chance to you hunt down the wild animals in a big dark jungle with different jungle environments. You have to be careful when you trying to kill furious animals, they may back attack on you.
